title: The Best Dell & Alienware Deals and Coupons: Gaming Laptops, PCs, Monitors, and More
description: The deals include PCs for different needs and budgets.
author: Eric Song
excerpt: The deals include PCs for different needs and budgets.
text: Not everyone is the DIY type. If you're in the market for a prebuilt gaming PC, Dell is one of best brands we'd recommend. Alienware desktops and laptops feature solid build quality, top-of-the-line gaming performance, excellent cooling (further improved on the newer models), aggressive styling, and pricing that is very competitive with other pre-built options. Best of all, there are plenty of sales that happen throughout the year, so it's not difficult to grab one of these computers at considerably less than their retail price. This page includes all of the best deals that are currently available.Dell and Alienware CouponsSign up for the Dell newsletter to get a one-time 10% off code Featured in this article: Desktop PCsFeatured in this article: LaptopsYou can quickly browse through all of the listed products on sale above. See below for our favorite picks.Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4090 Gaming PCGood for 4K gamingAlienware Aurora R16 Liquid-Cooled Intel Core i9-14900F RTX 4090 Gaming PC with 32GB RAM, 1TB SSDAlienware Aurora R16 Liquid-Cooled Intel Core i9-14900KF RTX 4090 Gaming PC with 32GB RAM, 2TB SSDThe Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4090 Super gaming PC drops to $2999.99 after a $400 instant discount. Alternatively, upgrade to an Intel Core i9-14900KF CPU and double the SSD capacity for $100 more. The RTX 4090 is the most powerful GPU on the market. In his RTX 4090 review, Chris Coke writes, "The RTX 4090 may be huge and expensive, but holy smokes if it doesn’t blow the competition out of the water... Until the rest of the pack can catch up, between its impressive hardware specs and its DLSS 3 AI wizardry, even the $1,599 price doesn’t seem unreasonable for the unrivaled frame rates that this card can crank out." The 4090 is also great for AI thanks to its 24GB of VRAM.Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4080 Super Gaming PCGood for 4K gamingAlienware Aurora R16 Liquid Cooled Intel Core i9-14900F RTX 4080 Super Gaming PC with 32GB RAM, 1TB SSDThe Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4080 Super gaming PC drops to $2299.99 after a $500 instant discount. The 4080 Super is a second generation card that supersedes the RTX 4080. It's Nvidia's second most powerful card and a superior GPU to AMD's Radeon RX 7900 RTX if you factor in DLSS and ray tracing performance. In our RTX 4080 Super review, Jacqueline Thomas writes, "If you're in the market for a 4K graphics card around $1,000, it's hard to think of any GPU that's a better purchase right now. This is the RTX 4080 that should have launched in 2022."Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4070 Super Gaming PCGood for 1440p gamingAlienware Aurora R16 Liquid Cooled Intel Core i7-14700F RTX 4070 Super Gaming PC with 16GB RAM, 1TB SSDAhead of Black Friday, Dell has dropped the price on this Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4070 Super gaming PC to $1499.99 after a $400 instant discount. This is the best value for gamers who want a PC that can run any game currently available, but don't want to spend to overspend. The RTX 4070 Super is the best graphics card for most people; it's not exorbitantly priced, and it's powerful enough to run games at up to 4K resolution (although 1440p is its sweet spot).Alienware m16 R2 16" Gaming LaptopAlienware m16 R2 16" QHD+ Intel Core Ultra 9 185H RTX 4060 Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 1TB SSDDell is offering an Alienware m16 R2 16" RTX 4060 gaming laptop for only $1,399.99 after a $300 instant discount. You'll need a decent amount of GPU power to be able to run games smoothly on the display's bumped-up QHD+ resolution. The RTX 4060 sits between the RTX 3070 and the RTX 3070 Ti, so it's definitely no slouch in terms of gaming performance. Some laptop manufacturers throttle the GPU in order to reduce the heat and lower power requirements. Alienware doesn't do that with its m-series laptops. For example, the RTX 4060 in this laptop has a 140W (115W + 25W Dynamic Boost) TGP rating, the maximum power for a 4060 mobile GPU.Alienware m18 R2 18" Gaming LaptopAlienware m18 R2 18" 2560x1600 (QHD+) Intel Core i9-14900HX RTX 4090 Gaming Laptop with 32GB RAM, 2TB SSDAlienware m18 R2 18" 2560x1600 (QHD+) Intel Core i7-14700HX RTX 4070 Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 1TB SSDThe Alienware m18 is the biggest Alienware laptop you can buy with an imposing 18" 2560x1600 display and top-of-the-line components. There are two models that are on sale today. The higher end model includes an Intel Core i9-14900HX CPU and RTX 4090 GPU for $2999.99. The RTX 4090 is still the most powerful mobile GPU on the market, and by a very substantial margin. It's roughly equivalent to a desktop RTX 3090 GPU. If that's beyond your budget, there's also a model equipped with an Intel Core i7-14700HX CPU and RTX 4070 GPU for $1899.99.Alienware x16 R2 16" Gaming LaptopAlienware x16 R2 16" Intel Core Ultra 7 155H RTX 4070 Slim Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 1TB SSDAlienware x16 R2 16" Intel Core Ultra 9 185H RTX 4080 Slim Gaming Laptop with 32GB RAM, 1TB SSDThe Alienware x16 gaming laptop is a slimmer and lighter redesign of the traditional m-series laptop. It's the thinnest 16" Alienware laptop ever and compares in build quality and performance to other high-end ultra-thin laptops like the Razer Blade. This Alienware x16 R2 laptop is built with premium materials, like a magnesium alloy chassis and palm rest, anodized aluminum lid, stainless steel keyboard tray, and Micro LED RGB accent lighting. It's only 0.73" thin and weighs in at 6 pounds. That's impressive considering the fact that this laptop can be equipped with the most power NVIDIA GPU.Alienware x14 R2 14" Gaming LaptopAlienware x14 R2 14" 2560x1600 (QHD+) Intel Core i7-13620H RTX 4050 Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSDDell is offering the Alienware x14 R2 RTX 4050 gaming laptop for only $999.99 after a $700 instant discount. This is the lowest price we've seen for Alienware's slimmest and lightest laptop. This model is equipped with an RTX 4050 with an 85W TGP. Even so, it's capable of running older or non-demanding games comfortably, especially if you drop the resolution down from QHD+ to 1080p. Some examples include League of Legends, Starcraft, Fortnite, and Genshin Impact. In our Horizon Forbidden West PC Performance Review, Michael Thompson writes, "Our RTX 4050 gaming machine represents a good section of the PC market. Using my optimized settings, we can hit 60fps in addition to superior image quality and performance to the PS4 version."Dell G-Series Gaming LaptopsDell G16 16" 2560x1600 (QHD+) Intel Core i9-13900HX RTX 4070 Gaming Laptop with 32GB RAM, 1TB SSDDell G15 15" AMD Ryzen 7 7840HS RTX 4060 Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSDDell has dropped the prices on both the and Dell G16 gaming laptops. Dells G-series laptops are great options for budget gamers. They offer excellent gaming performance equal to a comparably equipped Alienware laptop but at a much lower price point. They also have better build quality than Dell's consumer-oriented Inspiron lineup, with nicer materials that include anodized aluminum, and an aggressive cooling design borrowed from Alienware laptops.Some other resources you might be interested in:Best gaming laptop deals of 2024Best gaming PC deals of 2024Eric Song is the IGN commerce manager in charge of finding the best gaming and tech deals every day. When Eric isn't hunting for deals for other people at work, he's hunting for deals for himself during his free time.Originally posted: Oct 23, 2024 12:00 am
html:
Not everyone is the DIY type. If you're in the market for a prebuilt gaming PC, Dell is one of best brands we'd recommend. Alienware desktops and laptops feature solid build quality, top-of-the-line gaming performance, excellent cooling (further improved on the newer models), aggressive styling, and pricing that is very competitive with other pre-built options. Best of all, there are plenty of sales that happen throughout the year, so it's not difficult to grab one of these computers at considerably less than their retail price. This page includes all of the best deals that are currently available.

Dell and Alienware Coupons

  • Sign up for the Dell newsletter to get a one-time 10% off code

Featured in this article: Desktop PCs

Featured in this article: Laptops

You can quickly browse through all of the listed products on sale above. See below for our favorite picks.

Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4090 Gaming PC

Good for 4K gaming

Alienware Aurora R16 Liquid-Cooled Intel Core i9-14900F RTX 4090 Gaming PC with 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD

Alienware Aurora R16 Liquid-Cooled Intel Core i9-14900KF RTX 4090 Gaming PC with 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD

The Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4090 Super gaming PC drops to $2999.99 after a $400 instant discount. Alternatively, upgrade to an Intel Core i9-14900KF CPU and double the SSD capacity for $100 more. The RTX 4090 is the most powerful GPU on the market. In his RTX 4090 review, Chris Coke writes, "The RTX 4090 may be huge and expensive, but holy smokes if it doesn’t blow the competition out of the water... Until the rest of the pack can catch up, between its impressive hardware specs and its DLSS 3 AI wizardry, even the $1,599 price doesn’t seem unreasonable for the unrivaled frame rates that this card can crank out." The 4090 is also great for AI thanks to its 24GB of VRAM.

Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4080 Super Gaming PC

Good for 4K gaming

Alienware Aurora R16 Liquid Cooled Intel Core i9-14900F RTX 4080 Super Gaming PC with 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD

The Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4080 Super gaming PC drops to $2299.99 after a $500 instant discount. The 4080 Super is a second generation card that supersedes the RTX 4080. It's Nvidia's second most powerful card and a superior GPU to AMD's Radeon RX 7900 RTX if you factor in DLSS and ray tracing performance. In our RTX 4080 Super review, Jacqueline Thomas writes, "If you're in the market for a 4K graphics card around $1,000, it's hard to think of any GPU that's a better purchase right now. This is the RTX 4080 that should have launched in 2022."

Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4070 Super Gaming PC

Good for 1440p gaming

Alienware Aurora R16 Liquid Cooled Intel Core i7-14700F RTX 4070 Super Gaming PC with 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD

Ahead of Black Friday, Dell has dropped the price on this Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4070 Super gaming PC to $1499.99 after a $400 instant discount. This is the best value for gamers who want a PC that can run any game currently available, but don't want to spend to overspend. The RTX 4070 Super is the best graphics card for most people; it's not exorbitantly priced, and it's powerful enough to run games at up to 4K resolution (although 1440p is its sweet spot).

Alienware m16 R2 16" Gaming Laptop

Alienware m16 R2 16" QHD+ Intel Core Ultra 9 185H RTX 4060 Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD

Dell is offering an Alienware m16 R2 16" RTX 4060 gaming laptop for only $1,399.99 after a $300 instant discount. You'll need a decent amount of GPU power to be able to run games smoothly on the display's bumped-up QHD+ resolution. The RTX 4060 sits between the RTX 3070 and the RTX 3070 Ti, so it's definitely no slouch in terms of gaming performance. Some laptop manufacturers throttle the GPU in order to reduce the heat and lower power requirements. Alienware doesn't do that with its m-series laptops. For example, the RTX 4060 in this laptop has a 140W (115W + 25W Dynamic Boost) TGP rating, the maximum power for a 4060 mobile GPU.

Alienware m18 R2 18" Gaming Laptop

Alienware m18 R2 18" 2560x1600 (QHD+) Intel Core i9-14900HX RTX 4090 Gaming Laptop with 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD

Alienware m18 R2 18" 2560x1600 (QHD+) Intel Core i7-14700HX RTX 4070 Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD

The Alienware m18 is the biggest Alienware laptop you can buy with an imposing 18" 2560x1600 display and top-of-the-line components. There are two models that are on sale today. The higher end model includes an Intel Core i9-14900HX CPU and RTX 4090 GPU for $2999.99. The RTX 4090 is still the most powerful mobile GPU on the market, and by a very substantial margin. It's roughly equivalent to a desktop RTX 3090 GPU. If that's beyond your budget, there's also a model equipped with an Intel Core i7-14700HX CPU and RTX 4070 GPU for $1899.99.

Alienware x16 R2 16" Gaming Laptop

Alienware x16 R2 16" Intel Core Ultra 7 155H RTX 4070 Slim Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD

Alienware x16 R2 16" Intel Core Ultra 9 185H RTX 4080 Slim Gaming Laptop with 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD

The Alienware x16 gaming laptop is a slimmer and lighter redesign of the traditional m-series laptop. It's the thinnest 16" Alienware laptop ever and compares in build quality and performance to other high-end ultra-thin laptops like the Razer Blade. This Alienware x16 R2 laptop is built with premium materials, like a magnesium alloy chassis and palm rest, anodized aluminum lid, stainless steel keyboard tray, and Micro LED RGB accent lighting. It's only 0.73" thin and weighs in at 6 pounds. That's impressive considering the fact that this laptop can be equipped with the most power NVIDIA GPU.

Alienware x14 R2 14" Gaming Laptop

Alienware x14 R2 14" 2560x1600 (QHD+) Intel Core i7-13620H RTX 4050 Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD

Dell is offering the Alienware x14 R2 RTX 4050 gaming laptop for only $999.99 after a $700 instant discount. This is the lowest price we've seen for Alienware's slimmest and lightest laptop. This model is equipped with an RTX 4050 with an 85W TGP. Even so, it's capable of running older or non-demanding games comfortably, especially if you drop the resolution down from QHD+ to 1080p. Some examples include League of Legends, Starcraft, Fortnite, and Genshin Impact. In our Horizon Forbidden West PC Performance Review, Michael Thompson writes, "Our RTX 4050 gaming machine represents a good section of the PC market. Using my optimized settings, we can hit 60fps in addition to superior image quality and performance to the PS4 version."

Dell G-Series Gaming Laptops

Dell G16 16" 2560x1600 (QHD+) Intel Core i9-13900HX RTX 4070 Gaming Laptop with 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD

Dell G15 15" AMD Ryzen 7 7840HS RTX 4060 Gaming Laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD

Dell has dropped the prices on both the and Dell G16 gaming laptops. Dells G-series laptops are great options for budget gamers. They offer excellent gaming performance equal to a comparably equipped Alienware laptop but at a much lower price point. They also have better build quality than Dell's consumer-oriented Inspiron lineup, with nicer materials that include anodized aluminum, and an aggressive cooling design borrowed from Alienware laptops.

  • Best gaming PC deals of 2024

Eric Song is the IGN commerce manager in charge of finding the best gaming and tech deals every day. When Eric isn't hunting for deals for other people at work, he's hunting for deals for himself during his free time.
